classes.name: CenterEdgeConnectionAnchor
classes.description: The CenterEdgeConnectionAnchor's location is found by calculating the intersection of a line drawn from the center point of its owner's box (the parent of the connection port) to a reference point on that box. A Connection using the ChopBoxAnchor will be oriented such that they point to their port owner's center.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: the figure to use for the anchor calculation

functions.name: getLocation
functions.description: Returns the location where the Connection should be anchored in absolute coordinates. The anchor may use the given reference Point to calculate this location.

parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: The reference Point in absolute coordinates

parameters.name: inquiringConnection
parameters.description: the connection who ask for the location.

functions.name: getBox
functions.description: Returns the bounds of this Anchor's owner. Subclasses can override this method to adjust the box. Maybe you return the box of the port parent (the parent figure)

functions.name: getReferencePoint
functions.description: Returns the bounds of this Anchor's owner. Subclasses can override this method to adjust the box. Maybe you return the box of the port parent (the parent figure)

parameters.name: inquiringConnection
parameters.description: the connection who ask for the location.

functions.name: getOwner
functions.description: Returns the Figure that contains this ConnectionAnchor.

functions.name: setOwner
functions.description: Set the owner of the Anchor.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: the new owner of the anchor locator

classes.name: ChopboxConnectionAnchor
classes.description: The ChopboxAnchor's location is found by calculating the intersection of a line drawn from the center point of its owner's box (the parent of the connection port) to a reference point on that box. A Connection using the ChopBoxAnchor will be oriented such that they point to their port owner's center.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: the figure to use for the anchor calculation

functions.name: getLocation
functions.description: Returns the location where the Connection should be anchored in absolute coordinates. The anchor may use the given reference Point to calculate this location.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: The reference Point in absolute coordinates

parameters.name: inquiringConnection
parameters.description: the connection who ask for the location.

functions.name: getBox
functions.description: Returns the bounds of this Anchor's owner. Subclasses can override this method to adjust the box. Maybe you return the box of the port parent (the parent figure)

functions.name: getReferencePoint
functions.description: Returns the reference point for this anchor in absolute coordinates. This might be used by another anchor to determine its own location.

parameters.name: inquiringConnection
parameters.description: the connection who ask for the location.

functions.name: getOwner
functions.description: Returns the Figure that contains this ConnectionAnchor.

functions.name: setOwner
functions.description: Set the owner of the Anchor.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: the new owner of the anchor locator

classes.name: ConnectionAnchor
classes.description: An object to which a {@link draw2d.Connection} will be anchored.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: the figure to use for the anchor calculation

functions.name: getLocation
functions.description: Returns the location where the Connection should be anchored in absolute coordinates. The anchor may use the given reference Point to calculate this location.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: the opposite reference point

parameters.name: inquiringConnection
parameters.description: the connection who ask for the location.

functions.name: getOwner
functions.description: Returns the Figure that contains this ConnectionAnchor.

functions.name: setOwner
functions.description: Set the owner of the Anchor.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: the new owner of the anchor locator

functions.name: getBox
functions.description: Returns the bounds of this Anchor's owner. Subclasses can override this method to adjust the box. Maybe you return the box of the port parent (the parent figure)

functions.name: getReferencePoint
functions.description: Returns the reference point for this anchor in absolute coordinates. This might be used by another anchor to determine its own location.

parameters.name: inquiringConnection
parameters.description: the connection who ask for the location.

classes.name: FanConnectionAnchor
classes.description:
The FanConnectionAnchor's location is found by calculating the intersection of a line drawn from the center point of its owner's box (the parent of the connection port) to a reference point on that box. Additional the anchor resolves conflicts by spread the anchor if more than one connection has the same reference point.
In a case of a DirectRouter parallel connections are the result.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: the figure to use for the anchor calculation

parameters.name: separation
parameters.description: the separation or fan distance between the concurrent/conflicting anchors

functions.name: getLocation
functions.description: Returns the location where the Connection should be anchored in absolute coordinates. The anchor may use the given reference Point to calculate this location.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: The reference Point in absolute coordinates

parameters.name: inquiringConnection
parameters.description: the connection who ask for the location.

functions.name: getBox
functions.description: Returns the bounds of this Anchor's owner. Subclasses can override this method to adjust the box. Maybe you return the box of the port parent (the parent figure)

functions.name: getReferencePoint
functions.description: Returns the reference point for this anchor in absolute coordinates. This might be used by another anchor to determine its own location.

parameters.name: inquiringConnection
parameters.description: the connection who ask for the location.

functions.name: getOwner
functions.description: Returns the Figure that contains this ConnectionAnchor.

functions.name: setOwner
functions.description: Set the owner of the Anchor.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: the new owner of the anchor locator
